title: Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) shall, in so far as it is not already in
heading: Order 2022.

title: Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) shall, in so far as it is not already in
heading: The 6th day of January 2022 is fixed as the date on which Part 2 of the
text_raw:
2. 
The 6th day of January 2022 is fixed as the date on which Part 2 of the 
Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) shall, in so far as it is not already in 
operation, come into operation in relation to persons born on or after the 1st 
day of June 2002. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 January, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [3] 3

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.)
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.)

title: Disability Act 2005 (No. 14 of 2005) shall, in so far as it is not already in
heading: These regulations provide for the extension of Part 2, Disability Act
text_raw:
1. 
These regulations provide for the extension of Part 2, Disability Act 
2005, providing for access to a statutory Assessment of Need to anyone born 
on or after 1, June 2002. 

Part 2 of the Disability Act (2005) provides for independent Assessments of 
Needs for health and education services occasioned by a disability, and for 
subsequent Service Statements setting out the services that the individuals 
concerned will receive, subject to available resources.
